quote: So far I had the god of evil and the god of terror on my side. My good-guy image was taking a serious beating. Maybe I should recruit some unicorns or kittens with rainbow powers to even us out.
quote_letters: SO FAR I HAD THE GOD OF EVIL AND THE GOD OF TERROR ON MY SIDE MY GOOD-GUY IMAGE WAS TAKING A SERIOUS BEATING MAYBE I SHOULD RECRUIT SOME UNICORNS OR KITTENS WITH RAINBOW POWERS TO EVEN US OUT
